name: Scotland
description: The 2022 Census in Scotland significantly changed Data Zone boundaries, historic data has been adjusted to the new boundaries

name: Complex border change
description: This LSOA had a complex border change between 2011 and 2021, historical data uses closest matching LSOA

name: LSOAs merged
description: This LSOA was formed in 2021 by merging two LSOAs, historical data has been merged

name: LSOAs split
description: This LSOA was formed in 2021 by splitting two LSOAs, historical data has been split

name: Zero Population
description: At some point this LSOA has had zero residents
